name: Turtle Tunes Quiz | Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which friend of the Turtles helped to get them the TV special they were recording?
questions.explanation:
April O'Neil.

	April, who worked at Channel 6 News, had connections in the TV industry. She used those connections to get the Turtles a TV show where they played and performed all of their own favorite songs.

questions.text: What was the first song sung by the four brothers?
options: It's a Pitty When the City Isn't Clean
questions.explanation:
We're the Turtles.

	An original composition for the special, "We're the Turtles" introduced the four brothers to the children who were helping them produce the special. The song has the Turtles running through the park, skateboarding and generally having fun while all the children arrive.

questions.text: Which of the four Turtles can't swim?
questions.explanation:
Leonardo.

	During one of the songs Leonardo was shown floating in the pond in a small boat. The lyrics mention him not being able to swim, despite being a giant turtle. The song was "Leonardo Has a Row Boat" sung to the tune of "Yankee Doodle Dandy".

questions.text: During the song "Skateboardin' Round The Fountain" which Turtle disappeared in the park?
questions.explanation:
Mikey.

	Mikey was the just out cruising on his skateboard and got separated from the rest of the group. They spent a portion of the song then searching for Mikey so they could finish making the TV show.

questions.text: All four Turtles carried their weapons while filming in the park.
questions.explanation:
False.

	None of them took their weapons to the TV show taping. While it was not mentioned that their weapons weren't there, it can clearly be seen that the weapon holsters on their belts were empty.

questions.text: What was the name of the show the four brothers were filming?
questions.explanation:
TMNT TV.

	The brothers named their show "TMNT TV", though the exact reason was never revealed. The show was a variety show of sorts along with a musical interface where the Turtles played their favorite hits. It appeared that the Turtles' favorite songs were their own versions of children's songs.

questions.text: Leonardo mentioned his middle name during one segment of the show. What is it?
questions.explanation:
Antonio.

	According to the same segment, Mikey's middle name is Sylvester. The other two Turtles never mentioned their own middle names. The names in this special were not canon and have not stuck in other incarnations of the Turtles.

questions.text: According to the song "Don't Talk to Strangers" what should you do?
questions.explanation:
Use a codeword.

	"Use a codeword" was the chorus to the song, and was repeated over and over during the song. "Don't Talk to Strangers" was one of the four original songs made for the special.

questions.text: Did the Footclan show up in the park?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	It wouldn't be a "Ninja Turtles" special without the Footclan. The Foot is an ancient order of ninjas from Japan that came to America decades in the past. They are led by the evil Shredder.

questions.text: While singing one of the songs, the Turtles rode various carnival rides in the park. Which ride made Raph ill?
questions.explanation:
A Carousel.

	Raph was shown getting queasy while going around in circles on the Carousel ride. The song they sang was "I Love To Ride The Carousel" to the tune of "Oh, Susanna!" Despite April being mentioned as the person who helped them get the show they were filming, she never appeared on camera during the special.
